2.label: Basic Set
2.description: The sensor sends a Basic Set command to directly trigger devices in response to events.

3.label: Notification Report
3.description: The sensor sends a Notification Report when the door either opens or closes.

4.label: Binary Sensor Report
4.description: The sensor sends it a Binary Sensor Report when the door either opens or closes.

1.label: BASIC_SET Off Delay
1.description: The delay time from when the Door/Window Sensor sends the BASIC_SET command.

2.label: BASIC_SET Level
2.description: Sets the value sent by the BASIC_SET command to Association Group 2
